message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a product that's truly one-of-a-kind. I believe its value to be substantial, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. My asking price for this unique offering is $2000000. I'm open to discussing your perspective on its value and exploring potential adjustments to the price to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm interested in the product, but $2000000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to consider a price of $1400000. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective on the price. While $1400000 is below my desired range, I'm willing to consider a compromise. I'm prepared to reduce the price to $1750000. This price still reflects the product's significant value and offers you a considerable opportunity. Let's continue this conversation and explore a mutually agreeable solution.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1750000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1600000, but I think that's the maximum I can stretch to. Can you meet me at this price?
